abilities.name: GALACTIC THREAT
abilities.description: You cannot vote on agendas. Once per agenda phase, after an agenda is revealed, you may predict aloud the outcome of that agenda. If your prediction is correct, gain 1 technology that is owned by a player who voted how you predicted.

abilities.name: TECHNOLOGICAL SINGULARITY
abilities.description: Once per combat, after 1 of your opponent's units is destroyed, you may gain 1 technology that is owned by that player.

abilities.name: PROPAGATION
abilities.description: You cannot research technology. When you would research a technology, gain 3 command tokens instead.

flagship.name: The Alastor
abilities: At the start of a space combat, choose any number of your ground forces in this system to participate in that combat as if they were ships.

base.name: Antivirus
base.effect: At the start of a combat: Place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Nekro player cannot use their TECHNOLOGICAL SINGULARITY faction ability against you.
base.returnCondition: If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Nekro player's units, return this card to the Nekro player.

base.name: Nekro Malleon
base.ability: During the action phase: You may exhaust this card to choose a player; that player may discard 1 action card or spend 1 command token from their command sheet to gain 2 trade goods.

base.name: Nekro Acidos
base.ability: After you gain a technology: You may draw 1 action card.

base.name: UNIT.DSGN.FLAYESH
base.ability: ACTION: Choose a planet that has a technology specialty in a system that contains your units. Destroy any other player's units on that planet. Gain trade goods equal to that planet's combined resource and influence values and gain 1 technology that matches the specialty of that planet. Then, purge this card.
